resources.string: Privacy Notice
Review Privacy Notice
We will
We won\'t
You can
Full Notice
Collect the data you give us when you register and when you use the App. This may include sensitive data like your health information.
Collect standard usage data or log information.
Protect your privacy and store the data in a secure cloud server in the US.
Share de-identified data with other researchers in the US and abroad.
Retain your data as long as we need it unless you request deletion.
"Delete your data when you ask us to.
Tell you if we make changes to our privacy policy.
Access your contacts, photos or other personal information stored on your phone.
Sell or rent your data.
Track your browsing activities on other Apps.
Use your data for advertising.
Ask to access, download or delete your data.
Decide if we can collect passive data from your device, like how much time you use your device each day.
Decide what optional information to give us. For example, giving us your zipcode will tell us about the weather or air quality where you are.
Allow us to turn on your phone camera or microphone when it is necessary to use the App.
Choose to share your data for future research.
Opt in to receive notifications and invitations about other research.
